articles.description: You need great developer tools to build great content and great apps. Google just dropped a set of developer tools for Assistant that look awesome!
articles.content:
Source: Android Central
Google Assistant has grown into its own platform since it was launched. Not only is it smarter than ever, but with devices like the Nest Hub or Nest Mini, it's no longer just… [+4441 chars]
